This focused update brings important stability improvements and bug fixes to make your ExtraDock experience even smoother.

What's Fixed & Improved

  • Collapse/Expand Fix: Resolved an issue where dock collapse and expand actions weren't working consistently. Your docks will now respond reliably every time.
  • App Menu Improvements: Fixed menu bar functionality and made menu interactions more responsive and intuitive.

We're continuously working to refine ExtraDock and appreciate your feedback as we build the best dock management experience for Mac users.
